name: Adult App Store | MiKandi
overview:
MiKandi is an uncensored adult app store on Android devices. The app store serves a strict 18+ audience. MiKandi is a Seattle based startup that launched late November 2009 and has since been downloaded by over 4 million users with 1 million registered users, over 3,000 registered developers worldwide distributing 8000+ adult-themed apps.

MiKandi announced the first google glass porn app in May 2013.

MiKandi does not place heavy restrictions or tries to censor the applications developers wish to publish in the market. The app store’s view on censorship resonates with those adults in the developer and user communities that want the freedom to create and download the mobile applications that they want without restriction.
